description: This file defines a UI Button component using LightningJS framework, including its template, state, and input handling.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Returns the template string for rendering the button element with dynamic content based on state.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's state variables: isFavorited, favoriteText, and unfavoriteText.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input event, toggling the isFavorited state.
